resources.string: Help, support or any other queries.
New ideas and desired enhancements for this app.
Something in this app is broken or not working as expected.
We will contact you soon regarding your experience and feedback when we resolve your issue.
Write your feedback/ suggestion/ query here…
Please as detailed as possible. What did you expect and what happend instead?
To help us fix the problem, your report will include a list of steps to reproduce the issue.
